classmethod validate_host(v)[source]¶

Validate the host field of the ConnectionConfig model.

Parameters:

v – The value of the host field.

Raises:

ValueError – If the host is empty or not a valid hostname or IP address.

The validated host value.

classmethod validate_port(v)[source]¶

Validate the port field of the ConnectionConfig model.

Parameters:

v – The value of the port field.

Raises:

ValueError – If the port is not an integer between 1 and 65535.

Returns:

The validated port value.

model_config = {}¶

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

class apps_logging_app.databases.base.BaseDatabase(config)[source]¶

Bases: ABC

Parameters:

config (BaseDatabaseConfig)

execute(query, params=None)[source]¶

Execute a query with the given parameters and return the result as a Future.

The query will be executed in a separate thread, allowing the caller to continue without blocking.

Parameters:

  • query (str) – The query to execute.

  • params (Dict[str, Any] | None) – Optional parameters to pass to the query.

Returns:

A Future object that will contain the result of the query.

Return type:

Any

shutdown()[source]¶

Shut down the database.

This method stops the dispatcher thread and waits for it to finish, then joins the queue and shuts down the executor, waiting for all tasks to finish.

Returns:

None

apps_logging_app.databases.registry module¶

class apps_logging_app.databases.registry.DatabaseEntry[source]¶

Bases: Generic[C]

config_model: Type[C]¶
database_class: Type[BaseDatabase]¶
apps_logging_app.databases.registry.register_database(*, database_type, config_model)[source]¶

Registers a database class with the given config model and type.

Parameters:

  • database_class (Type[BaseDatabase]) – The database class to register.

  • database_type (str)

  • config_model (Type[BaseDatabaseConfig])

Returns:

The registered database class.

Return type:

Type[BaseDatabase]

The decorator sets the type attribute of the database class to the given type. It also creates a DatabaseEntry and adds it to the DATABASE_REGISTRY with the given type as the key.
